# Mantle of Evil (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Hades (Domain)|Hades]] 3

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 137

*You invoke the powers of evil, and a dark, wavering field of unholy energy wraps around you like a cloak.*

This spell functions like *[[Mantle of Chaos (Spell)|mantle of chaos]]*, except that *mantle of evil* grants spell resistance against spells with the good descriptor.
